2. How We Use This Information
We may share information to comply with legal obligations (e.g., responding to lawful requests by public authorities) or protect the rights, property, and safety of Leaf users.
We use this information to provide prospects and customers with services.

text: We may also use your IP address to help diagnose problems with our server and to administer our website, analyze trends, track visitor movements, and gather broad demographic information that assists us in identifying visitor preferences.

The information may include internet protocol (IP) addresses, the region or general location where your computer or device is accessing the internet, browser type, operating system and other usage information about the use of Ner Chat Inc.'s website, including a history of the pages you view.

Privacy Policy

4. Data Retention and Security : Retention: We retain Leaf user data only as long as necessary to provide the Leaf service or as required by law or school policies.
We may collect non-identifying information about how users interact with Leaf (e.g., features used, time spent on different parts of the app) to help us improve the user experience.

The information may include internet protocol (IP) addresses, the region or general location where your computer or device is accessing the internet, browser type, operating system and other usage information about the use of Ner Chat Inc.'s website, including a history of the pages you view.
We use this information to help us design our site to better suit our users' needs.

When technically feasible, Ner Chat Inc. will--at your request--provide your personal data to you.
Your personal data is stored by the Ner Chat Inc. on its servers, and on the servers of the cloud-based database management services the Ner Chat Inc. engages, located in the United States.

Ner Chat Inc. retains prospect data until such time as it no longer has business value and is purged from Ner Chat Inc. systems.

The Ner Chat Inc. retains service data for the duration of the customer's business relationship with the Ner Chat Inc. and for a period of time thereafter, to analyze the data for Ner Chat Inc.'s own operations, and for historical and archiving purposes associated with Ner Chat Inc.'s services.

Depending on the circumstance, Ner Chat Inc. also collects and transfers to the U.S. personal data with consent; to perform a contract with you; or to fulfill a compelling legitimate interest of Ner Chat Inc. in a manner that does not outweigh your rights and freedoms.
